content: Easy to see that you are angry, but hard to see why. You are mad because your elected representative lives in another district and hunks that our immigration laws should be enforced? One would think that anyone representing the government would want the laws enforced even if they were working at changing the laws. We are a nation of laws or supposed to be. The alternative to that is being a nation where the laws say what those in power want it to say on a case by case basis. One of those two things opens you up to banana republic style corruption. By all means actively work to change things for the better, but please put some thought into the long term impacts of those changes.
